question: 刑事
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>punish</kanji> <kanji>action</kanji> is when someone goes out to try to find people who do bad things, so that they can be punished. The people who do this are people like a <vocabulary>police detective</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>detective</vocabulary>).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
